snippet.title: Stream Raiders | How-To-Play Quick Guide
snippet.description:
Whether you’re a new streamer (or viewer) to the game this quick guide will teach you all the basics of how to play! 

Stream Raiders is a community-based battle game played alongside your main content—live during stream! The streamer is the “Captain” and the viewers make up the army. Progress through the campaign map together to collect rewards and level up your units along the way! 

Join the battle at https://www.streamraiders.com/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/StreamRaiders
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/captaintv

This video was made in collaboration with our Stream Raiders Captain & Partner, AlfredGG! 
Follow him here:  https://www.youtube.com/c/alfredgg
